content: adult bed socks approximately size 4 to 7 a free jacknitss pattern by jacqueline gibb adult bed socks make 2 the same using size 4mm needles and 60grams double knit yarn use the thumb method to cast on 48sts row 1 through 24 * k2 p2 repeat from * to end row 25 through 30 starting with a knit row work 6 row in stocking stitch row 31 k32 turn row 32 k16 turn continue on these 16sts and work 42 row in garter stitch every row knit break off the yarn and with the right side facing rejoin the yarn to the start of the 42row panel and pick up and knit 21sts up this side edge now knit across the next 16sts then pick up and knit 21sts down the other side of the panel finally knit across to the end =90sts knit a further 15rows in garter stitch shape the sole row 1 k1 k2tog k40 k2tog twice k40 k2tog k1 =86sts next and every alternate row knit row 3 k1 k2tog k38 k2tog twice k38 k2tog k1 =82sts row 5 k1 k2tog k36 k2tog twice k36 k2tog k1 =78sts row 7 k1 k2tog k34 k2tog twice k34 k2tog k1 =74sts row 9 k1 k2tog k32 k2tog twice k32 k2tog k1 =70sts cast off with right sides together oversew the back and foot seam continuously abreviations k=knit p=purl k2tog= knit 2 stitches together sts= stitches
